column7: Offers the statistical and econometric tools to describe and understand common economic issues. The emphasis will be on the multiple regression model and its associated extensions regularly used to overcome traditional econometric issues. The course will introduce and use an advanced statistical software for hands-on exercises. No prior experience with the software is expected or required. Credit is not given for ACE 264 if credit for ECON 203 or equivalent has been earned. Prerequisite: MATH 124 or MATH 125; ACE 262.
column9: Credit is not given for ACE 264 if credit for ECON 203 or equivalent has been earned. Prerequisite: MATH 124 or MATH 125; ACE 262.
